dcterms:creator: J. Jiménez-Raboso
A. Campoy-Nieves
A. Manjavacas-Lucas
J. Gómez-Romero
M. Molina-Solana
dcterms:description: Sinergym is a building simulation and control framework designed for training reinforcement learning agents, providing a standardized and flexible design that facilitates the comparison of algorithms under various environments.
dcterms:title: Sinergym

dcterms:creator: T. Wei
Y. Wang
Q. Zhu
dcterms:description: 5ZoneAutoDXVAV is a dataset representing a single-story rectangular office building divided into five zones, equipped with a Variable Air Volume (VAV) HVAC system, used for deep reinforcement learning in HVAC control.
dcterms:title: 5ZoneAutoDXVAV

dcterms:creator: M. Biemann
F. Scheller
X. Liu
L. Huang
dcterms:description: 2ZoneDataCenterHVAC is a dataset representing a one-story data center divided into two asymmetrical zones, used for evaluating model-free reinforcement learning algorithms for continuous HVAC control.
dcterms:title: 2ZoneDataCenterHVAC

dcterms:creator: U.S. Department of Energy
dcterms:description: TMY3 Weather Data provides typical meteorological year data for building energy simulation, which is essential for evaluating HVAC control strategies under varying weather conditions.
dcterms:title: TMY3 Weather Data
